title: Gold 2 Support Main looking for team
body: Yo, Season 4 gold 2, support main. in game name is TRVPxLORD, add me if your interested in me to join your team as your suppport

replies.body:
IGN: Krylo 
I took the liberty of adding you :) 
[Here's](http://www.reddit.com/r/TeamRedditTeams/comments/2ov2qx/ocessplatlf_teamsr/) a thread I made on what I'm currently looking for.
Msg me in client if you want in, so I know its you :)
